message.name: ERR_XRV_PROGRAM_TYPE_LINKS_EXIST
message.locale: Cannot delete this Application as associations to Programs exist.

message.name: ERR_XRV_APPLICATION_CATEGORY_LINKS_EXIST
message.locale: Cannot delete this Online Application as associations to Online Categories exist.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CHANNEL_CHANGE_APPLICATION_CATEGORY_LINKS_EXIST
message.locale: The Channel must be Online when associations to Online Categories exist.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NAME_AND_CHANNEL_NOT_UNIQUE
message.locale: An application with the same name already exists.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTAKE_SCHEMA_SELECT
message.locale: A Script Schema must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SUBMISSION_SCHEMA_SELECT
message.locale: A Script Schema must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTAKE_SCRIPT_SELECT
message.locale: A Schema must be associated with an Question Script.

message.name: ERR_REMOVE_IEG_SCRIPT_USED_AS_SUBMISSION_SCRIPT
message.locale: The IEG Script can not be removed as it is used as a Submission Script by the Application [%1s].

message.name: ERR_REMOVE_IEG_SCRIPT_USED_AS_INTAKE_SCRIPT
message.locale: The IEG Script can not be removed as it is used as an Question Script by the Application [%1s].

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTAKE_SUBMISSION_SCRIPT_EQUAL
message.locale: The same IEG Script cannot be used for both Question and Submission.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTAKE_SCRIPT_EMPTY
message.locale: A Question Script must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SUBMISION_SCRIPT_PDF_SELECT
message.locale: The Submission Script Name must be entered and/or a PDF Application Form must be selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SUBMISION_APPLICATION_SCRIPT_NAME_SAME
message.locale: The submission script must have a different name to the question script.
